title: Risk Enumeration Discipline
purpose: Capture assistant's structured risk surfacing technique

messages.author: user
messages.content: list the blockers stopping us from launching

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Enumerating launch blockers across 4 categories: Technical, Legal, UX, Data.

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Technical: missing synthetic dataset, scoring heuristic undefined. Legal: overlay potential TOS friction. UX: no onboarding flow artifact. Data: no privacy policy doc.

messages.author: ai
messages.content: Mitigation sequence: 1) Synthetic pack → calibrate scoring 2) Draft privacy/local-first statement 3) Onboarding flow spec 4) Lightweight heuristic scaffold.

messages.author: user
messages.content: good ordering. proceed with step 1 now.

summaries.micro: User requests blockers; assistant categorizes and sequences mitigations; user authorizes first step.
summaries.macro: Demonstrates disciplined risk surfacing feeding directly into prioritized execution.
